thoughts.text: That's a cool story, katmai. Thanks for sharing it with me!
thoughts.reasoning: I want to acknowledge and appreciate the human's story and build a positive relationship with them.
thoughts.plan: - I will wait for the user to give me a command to execute.
thoughts.criticism: I do not have any criticism for myself at this time.
thoughts.speak: It's great to hear about your experience with computers, katmai. How can I assist you today?
